content.raw:
Team usyd\_robotx, we’re running some quick tests as a sanity check and I noticed that your team Docker image seems to run fine but the process `wamv/mapping` dies . I'm testing with the stationkeeping task.

```
+ docker run --net vrx-network --name vrx-competitor-system --env ROS_MASTER_URI=http://172.16.0.22:11311 --env ROS_IP=172.16.0.20 --ip 172.16.0.20 tisbutascratch/usyd_vrx:v3
rosmaster already setup
System INIT
... logging to /root/.ros/log/0552aab8-f523-11e9-ab59-0242ac100016/roslaunch-89be5d40352a-57.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://172.16.0.20:36627/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /gpctranslate/inTopic: vrx/wayfinding/wa...
 * /gpctranslate/outTopic: internal/waypoints
 * /gpstranslate/inTopic: vrx/station_keepi...
 * /gpstranslate/outTopic: internal/poses
 * /pathCtranslate/inTopic: internal/poses
 * /pathRtranslate/inTopic: internal/waypoints
 * /rosdistro: melodic
 * /rosversion: 1.14.3
 * /wamv/distance_threshold: 0.2
 * /wamv/expiry_time: 2
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/footprint: [[-2, -1.2], [2, ...
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/height: 100
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/inflation_layer/cost_scaling_factor: 1
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/inflation_layer/inflation_radius: 2.5
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/robot_radius: 1.5
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/static_map: True
 * /wamv/global_planner/costmap/width: 100
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/allow_unknown: True
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/default_tolerance: 0
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/old_navfn_behavior: False
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/planner_window_x: 10.0
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/planner_window_y: 10.0
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/publish_scale: 100
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/use_dijkstra: True
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/use_grid_path: False
 * /wamv/global_planner/planner/use_quadratic: True
 * /wamv/mapping/offset_x: 60.0
 * /wamv/mapping/offset_y: 30.0
 * /wamv/mapping/resolution: 0.2
 * /wamv/mapping/width: 1024
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/angle_increment: 0.00872664625
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/angle_max: 1.5
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/angle_min: -1.5
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/min_height: -3
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/range_max: 100.0
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/range_min: 2
 * /wamv/pointcloud_to_laserscan/use_inf: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/base_link_frame: wamv/base_link
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0: /wamv/sensors/imu...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_config: [False, False, Fa...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_remove_gravitational_acceleration: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/map_frame: map
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0: /wamv/robot_local...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_config: [True, True, True...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/publish_tf: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/sensor_timeout: 2.0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/smooth_lagged_data: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/transform_time_offset: 0.1
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/two_d_mode: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/world_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/broadcast_utm_transform: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/datum: [21.30996, -157.8...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/magnetic_declination_radians: 0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/publish_filtered_gps: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/tf_prefix: wamv

 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/wait_for_datum: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/yaw_offset: 0
 * /wamv/robot_state_publisher/publish_frequency: 30
 * /wamv/robot_state_publisher/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/threshold: 40
 * /[wamv/mapping-14] process has died [pid 147, exit code -11, cmd /catkin_ws/devel/lib/vrx_navigation/mapping scan:=sensors/lidars/lidar/scan __name:=mapping __log:=/root/.ros/log/0552aab8-f523-11e9-ab59-0242ac100016/wamv-mapping-14.log].
```

Feel free to update your Docker image if this is important.
